/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the everyday life of the city. The street is lined with lush green trees, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze, casting dappled shadows on the pavement. On the left side of the street, red brick buildings stand tall, their vibrant hue adding a touch of warmth to the scene. These buildings, with their traditional architecture, hint at the rich history and culture of Beijing. On the right side of the street, modern cars are parked neatly, their sleek designs contrasting with the traditional buildings. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it, adding depth to the expansive sky. The image beautifully encapsulates the blend of old and new that characterizes Beijing.
